Reviews.Title: Once again, avoid this model due to GE spec errors
Reviews.Author: The Folded Space
Reviews.Content: My entirely truthful review has been taken down, so let's try again.I returned this camera without having shot a single image or video due to GE getting the specs wrong on their website and dropping the ball on the geotagging feature.Originally, GE listed that it would shoot 720p 30fps (NTSC), but it is actually limited to 25fps. I have been informed that the site has corrected this now.GE lists a GPS option on their site for this model. There should be a Rakon GPS radio chip inside that uses Geotate software. It may have the chip, but no info is in the manual - nothing! I emailed Geotate and have received no response.The camera is larger than the listed dimensions.

Reviews.Title: Littel price but satisfied overall
Reviews.Author: A. Smith
Reviews.Content: I currently own a Canon 450D DSLR and thought I wouldn't need a point and shoot. That is until my wife didn't want to carry the big DSLR. However, I do kind of miss my last point and shoot camera, but it had a few similarities like the display size and my new GE camera has some upgrades that makes it a little easier on the switch. This camera is great because it's all display screen and mostly no buttons which I like. If you don't want to mess with settings it's as simple as point, shoot and be amazed. I'm really impressed with the build quality of the E1050 TW especially with a metal casing which helps if it's accidentally dropped. I knew that's built by Stainless Steel which I can NOT find in the market. It's a 10MP beauty! I spent $223 on this camera and I think it was worth it. Well done GE!

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera!!
Reviews.Author: C. Wiltse
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased as a Christmas gift and the touch screen features make this camera very easy to use for the person who doesn't want to learn where a bunch of different buttons are.  The pictures are very good quality.  This really isn't designed for the expert.  SLR type cameras would fit that better.  It is compact, fast, and easy.  It easily fits in a purse and is readily available to quickly capture those moments where you say "I wish I had a camera".

Reviews.Title: Great Choice!
Reviews.Author: M. Ejbeh
Reviews.Content: It took me a week in comparing and searching digital cameras. I was searching for the best camera below 150$, my final choice was between the GE E1050TW 140$ from amazon and Pentax  optio a40 130$, the only advantage of the optio is the 12 mp, the advantages of the GE you can't find in more expensive cameras like the  touch screen the panorama picture which is a great option and very useful also the x5 zooming and the HD video. Shooting HD video is limited to 30 minutes per shot whatever the size of the sd card but i think it is fair enough for a continuous shooting and you can get another 30 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Brittany A. Greene
Reviews.Content: This camera is super easy to use and I love the touch screen! I let the battery charge for four hours before using and now the battery lasts a while. My old camera would die in an hour or less , I used this camera for five hours yesterday and it was still two- thirds charged when I was done! It's a great camera for the money. The pictures are beautiful!

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Howard Sheen "greentea"
Reviews.Content: I use this camera for taking pictures and videos. I find this camera really perfect,especially the picture quality (crisps and clear). The videos are clear too! but make sure you should buy a higher memory card, so you could take a long video. I also noticed the battery lasts for 4-5 hours which is cool. Another feature I like(voice recorder) you can record your voice on the pictures sweet!! I love the touchscreen seems like It's fun to touch. A lot of features that you would love about this camera. I would recommend it for everybody whose looking for a picture quality,longlasting battery,touchscreen kind of camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Terri "Happy Camper"
Reviews.Content: Love the big screen on the back.  The small size is very convenient to take anywhere.  Takes great pictures, very clear and lots of detail.  Lots of additional features we are still discovering!  All in all a great camera!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Jo Hertsenberg "jh"
Reviews.Content: Really like this camera---the touch screen makes more sense to me from an operational standpoint and it takes great pictures. The seller was immediately responsive and I received the camera before I expected it to arrive.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Kip
Reviews.Content: The camera is great and you will get your money's worth. The only exception is that the battery rapidly dies if you use it to record video. If you keep using the video option you are probably going to use it for less than four hours. If you are mostly going to use it for still pictures then this camera will be great for you.

Reviews.Title: GE 10MP Touch Screen Camera
Reviews.Author: Roger Ditto
Reviews.Content: This is a great camers!  It was very easy to use - actually an intuituve series of menus.  Very east to find what is needed and also easy to change settings.  It takes great photos and video as well.  The touch screen is really cool and allows more real estate for viewing your photos.  It is small and light weight and is great for taking on hikes.  I took it on my recent cruise and came back with wonderful photos.  I recommend this camera to any one.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Donna J. Schneider
Reviews.Content: I bought this neat little camera just before we left for Vegas.  It fit in my purse, is light weight and takes great pictures.  It also seems very durable.  I'm glad I have it!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: R. James
Reviews.Content: I could not have made a better choice, its every thing i expected and some more...love it love it love it... color's perfect, shots are awe some... i loveeeee it.. and i got it in good time. :)

Reviews.Title: Was a great camera
Reviews.Author: M. Rosendaul
Reviews.Content: Wow. I didn't realize I never reviewed this thing. I bought it about 5 years ago. Still works great, a little bit of a battery hog, so I bought an extra to carry with me. Manual ISO was very helpful. It did get some dust inside the lens or on the sensor which I can't seem to shake off so it's in my work tools now and I upgraded to a bridge camera.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: KingManK
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly what it say's it is great for persons who want great quality pictures in a small compact camera love the touch screen

Reviews.Title: Excellent sharpness/contrast and true close to true color
Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: Before I bought this camera, I bought the Finepix z20 fd  and z100 fd, only to be extremely disappointed by the quality of the picture.  (I was replacing a Finepix v10 which took amazing images)  I then bought the Nikon L18, only to be disappointed when it broke in its third week of use.  My girlfriend has a Canon, which has excellent features, but poor contrast/sharpness.  I decided to give GE a try, figuring that there has to be something better/different out there.  It takes amazing pictures, with excellent color and contrast.  The video function has a habit of putting vertical lines down the images when there is any direct sunlight, but other than that, the camera takes amazing images.  The zoom is great, and the touch screen is very intuitive and easy to use.  I recommend this camera to anyone who is looking for a mid-sized point and shoot with a slightly larger zoom, and values crisp pictures.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: T. Harrell
Reviews.Content: I was actually going to get the ashton camera, until I read the reviews. So I decided to get this camera and I am so happy I did. It has amazing picture quality, it also has awesome focus. People will move and it still has a clear picture especially with impatient kids around I would really recommend this camera!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: AUGUSTO
Reviews.Content: This is a versatile great camera The touch display is very helpful It works like it says in each option. Easy to transfer photos to  your PC where you can edit when you just start with it, but later you get used to it choosing the correct option at the camera. Maybe a little heavy for the hand I got to use the strip to avoid a possibility to drop it. In a phrase  GREAT AND EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE.

Reviews.Title: LCD unusable in sun light
Reviews.Author: J. D. Barickman
Reviews.Content: I returned the camera since it was useless in outside light source conditions.  The LCD was unreadable in those conditions.

Reviews.Title: Fun, but not great.
Reviews.Author: Dylan "Smilodoncondor"
Reviews.Content: GE isn't particularly "known" for their cameras. They are more about industrial and medical stuff (our local coal-fire power plant uses 3 GE generators). That is where they excel. But, I know and trust GE as a company since they have been around for well over 100 years. I decided this camera looked like a great deal and was worth a try.The camera its self was very fun to use. It had a solid build (plastic outer casing) and the touch-screen was very easy and fun to use.. It felt like a very high-end camera.The picture quality did fall short of my expectations though. On full auto mode, the pictures showed plenty of grain or noise in darker areas. I played with the ISO settings and didn't notice much difference. The lighter areas showed that the image stabilization didn't work quite as well as others. The colors were typically too warm as well.The auto focus worked about average.The camera performed well with HD videos. Although like pictures, the colors were too warm.I liked that the camera was very fun to use and it looked very nice too. However I was somewhat disappointed in the picture quality. I must tell you though, that the only modern camera I have to compare it to is a $320 Cannon which is highly regarded.. so my review may be a little tougher than others.I purchased through Amazon for $179.99, which I feel is a good price for a high-feature camera. There are probably better cameras out there for the same money, but I feel it is a fair deal if you care more about ease of use as well as features than straight-out picture quality.And ending on that note, I am unable to say whether or not I would recommend it. It simply depends on which you care about more.

Reviews.Title: Just Wondering
Reviews.Author: Joyful&Content;
Reviews.Content: I am just wondering what experience the 5 star raters have had with reading the LCD while out in the sunshine?  : |

ProductInfo.Features:
10MP Digital Camera with 5x optical zoom and 4.5x digital zoom
3.0 Inch vibrant LCD with Auto-Brightness technology
Touch screen LCD and all glass aspheric lens
1280x720 MPEG-4 recording and HDTV output
Face Tracking and Panorama Stitching with Blink Face and Smile Detection
ProductInfo.Name: GE E1050TW-RD 10 MP Digital Camera with 5X Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch Touch Screen LCD with Auto Brightness (Red)
